name: code-indexer
description: A powerful code indexing tool with multi-platform support

scripts.release:core: pnpm --filter @code-indexer/core... run build && pnpm --filter @code-indexer/core publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.release:mcp: pnpm --filter @code-indexer/mcp... run build && pnpm --filter @code-indexer/mcp publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.release:vscode: pnpm --filter @code-indexer/core build && pnpm --filter semanticcodesearch run webpack && pnpm --filter semanticcodesearch release
